Class MapSpot

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapSpot

  • public class MapSpot
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of the grid shown on the main screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapSpot

        public MapSpot(javax.swing.JButton button,
               TerrainState ts,
               javax.swing.ImageIcon img)
        Creates a new instance of MapSpot. Contains all information about each cell of the grid on the main screen.
        Parameters:
        button - The JButton at that spot on the map
        ts - The TerrainState of that spot on the map
        img - The background Image of that spot on the map

      • MapSpot

        public MapSpot()
        Creates a new instance of MapSpot. Contains all information about each cell of the gird on the main screen.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Overrides Object's equal method, sees if two MapSpots are equal. Based on the Building or TerrainState at the MapSpot.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The Object to check equality against
